special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)[/i]
I – Create a Llanowar Elves token.
II – Create a Hypnotic Specter token.
III – Create a Serra Angel token.
IV – Create a Shivan Dragon token.
notes:
!tokens Llanowar Elves;Hypnotic Specter;Serra Angel;Shivan Dragon
!tag AuxiliaryOtter
